title: Chapter 1882 - Winds Rise And Clouds Gather
body:
Chapter 1882 - Winds Rise And Clouds Gather

To the far west of the Immortal Realm, deep below a never-melting field of ice, beneath layer upon layer of overlapping hidden realms, there stood an underground palace. The great hall was dark, with only a single lamp for light.

Jiang Tai’e opened the secret message he’d just received. When he finished reading it, a complicated look appeared on his beautifully handsome face.

A little while later, he let out a deep sigh. “You’re obviously well aware that this is a death trap, and a meticulous one at that, but you’re still going to jump right into it… Impressive, Wang Ye!”

There’d been bad blood between Jiang Tai’e and Wang Ye since before the Age of Fallen Immortals. They were irreconcilable, and Jiang Tai’e hated Wang Ye more than anyone.

But he couldn’t deny that Wang Ye was also the person he admired most.

It wasn’t just that his cultivation base was terrifying. Jiang Tai’e also admired his courage, ability to see the bigger picture, and breadth of spirit. They would have been dazzling in any era, and you could have searched the entire Immortal Realm without finding anyone else like him.

Take this death trap, for instance. In Su Yi’s shoes, Jiang Tai’e would never have gotten involved. After all, even...
original_title: Chapter 1882 - Winds Rise and Clouds Gather
